question: Which state / UT government has launched "Happiness Utsav" in its schools?
explanation: The Delhi government has recently launched \"Happiness Utsav\" in its schools to celebrate completion of a year of introduction of its happiness curriculum. During the festival, the first 50 minutes of each day, all children studying in Delhi govt schools will take part in various activities. Activities like plays, poems, exhibitions will be part of the 15-day festival which will culminate in a grand ceremony. During the fest, the morning assembly session and the first period will be combined to conduct activities.
